verbs.description: [ARG1: pig n’ whistle] [V: opens] [ARGM-TMP: tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: in former circus cafe space pig n whistle on broadway] is the new tenant of 392 broadway in saratoga springs which was home to a 14-year run of circus cafe before it closed last fall the restaurant opens at 12 30 p m tuesday aug 31 hours thereafter are 11 a m to midnight daily through track season hours will change after labor day circus cafe burnt hills jordan bush saratoga scott solomon todd bush saratoga springs
